confirmations.confirmed: Your email address has been successfully confirmed.
confirmations.send-instructions: You will receive an email with instructions for how to confirm your email address in a few minutes.
confirmations.send-paranoid-instructions: If your email address exists in our database, you will receive an email with instructions for how to confirm your email address in a few minutes.

failure.inactive: Your account is not activated yet.
failure.last-attempt: You have one more attempt before your account is locked.
failure.timeout: Your session expired. Please sign in again to continue.
failure.unauthenticated: You need to sign in or sign up before continuing.
failure.unconfirmed: You have to confirm your email address before continuing.

confirmation-instructions.instruction: You can confirm your account email through the link below:
confirmation-instructions.subject: Confirmation instructions

email-changed.message: We're contacting you to notify you that your email has been changed to {email}.
email-changed.subject: Email Changed

password-change.message: We're contacting you to notify you that your password has been changed.
password-change.subject: Password Changed

reset-password-instructions.instruction: Someone has requested a link to change your password. You can do this through the link below.
reset-password-instructions.instruction2: If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.
reset-password-instructions.instruction3: Your password won't change until you access the link above and create a new one.
reset-password-instructions.subject: Reset password instructions

unlock-instructions.instruction: Click the link below to unlock your account:
unlock-instructions.message: Your account has been locked due to an excessive number of unsuccessful sign in attempts.
unlock-instructions.subject: Unlock instructions

omniauth-callbacks.failure: Could not authenticate you from {kind} because "{reason}".

passwords.no-token: You can't access this page without coming from a password reset email. If you do come from a password reset email, please make sure you used the full URL provided.
passwords.send-instructions: You will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password in a few minutes.
passwords.send-paranoid-instructions: If your email address exists in our database, you will receive a password recovery link at your email address in a few minutes.
passwords.updated: Your password has been changed successfully. You are now signed in.
passwords.updated-not-active: Your password has been changed successfully.

registrations.destroyed: Bye! Your account has been successfully cancelled. We hope to see you again soon.

edit.leave-blank-if-you-don-t-want-to-change-: leave blank if you don't want to change it
edit.title: Edit {resource}
edit.we-need-your-current-password-to-confirm: we need your current password to confirm your changes

registrations.signed-up: Welcome! You have signed up successfully.
registrations.signed-up-but-inactive: You have signed up successfully. However, we could not sign you in because your account is not yet activated.
registrations.signed-up-but-locked: You have signed up successfully. However, we could not sign you in because your account is locked.
registrations.signed-up-but-unconfirmed: A message with a confirmation link has been sent to your email address. Please follow the link to activate your account.
registrations.update-needs-confirmation: You updated your account successfully, but we need to verify your new email address. Please check your email and follow the confirmation link to confirm your new email address.
registrations.updated: Your account has been updated successfully.
registrations.updated-but-not-signed-in: Your account has been updated successfully, but since your password was changed, you need to sign in again

unlocks.send-instructions: You will receive an email with instructions for how to unlock your account in a few minutes.
unlocks.send-paranoid-instructions: If your account exists, you will receive an email with instructions for how to unlock it in a few minutes.
unlocks.unlocked: Your account has been unlocked successfully. Please sign in to continue.

messages.already-confirmed: was already confirmed, please try signing in
messages.confirmation-period-expired: needs to be confirmed within {period}, please request a new one
messages.expired: has expired, please request a new one

not-saved.one: 1 error prohibited this {resource} from being saved:
not-saved.other: {count} errors prohibited this {resource} from being saved:
